short_summary: Construction of a new National Fire Cache facility in Banff National Park
description: The contractor should complete the work within 78 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer. This posting is the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase solicitation process: the first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers; the second phase will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings. Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the link provided above for complete details.
tags: Contracts Management - Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
### National Fire Cache Facility Tender Invitation
#### Notice ID: WS4387374379
#### Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)

---

### Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for the construction of a new National Fire Cache facility in Banff National Park, as part of a two-phase solicitation process.

### Request Details
* Tender Reference # : WS4387374379
* Publication Date: January 23, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 21, 2024, 14:00 EST
* Contract Title: National Fire Cache Facility - 5 Pnze (Phase 1)
* UN/SPSC Code: 72121000 (New Industrial Building and Warehouse Construction Services)
* Procurement Category: CNST (Canadian National Standards)
* Trade Agreements: This ITQ is open to suppliers from countries with a trade agreement with Canada, including the ALEC, CFTA, CETA, WTO GPA, CPTPP, and others.

### Objective
The objective is to construct a new National Fire Cache facility in Banff National Park within a timeframe of 78 weeks. The project will be delivered in two phases: Phase 1 - Qualification, and Phase 2 - Financial Bid.

### Procurement Method
The procurement method for this ITQ is Competitive - Open Bidding.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Contact Information
For more details and to obtain the complete tender package, please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18597939?extsite=MTg1OTc5MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18597939?extsite=MTg1OTc5MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Amendments
Please be advised that the closing time has been amended to February 21, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

---
